New Records: Mahmudullah c Parag b Nitish Kumar Reddy 41 (39b 0x4 3x6 55m) SR: 105.12
Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya showed he could still be as destructive as any batter, smashing 39 not out off just 16 balls
Najmul Hossain Shanto's innings showed what Bangladesh need to work on
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favourites given their home advantage
India could bring in Tilak Varma for Reddy and Harshit Rana for Mayank Yadav
Tamim Iqbal suggested to Shanto to open with Mehidy Hasan Miraz
Post-Match Reflections: Mahmudullah remarked that he retires as Bangladesh's most capped T20I player
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto admitted that his batters do not know how to score 180 in a T20I
Miscellaneous Highlights: In the five matches played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in IPL 2024, the 200-mark was breached in eight out of ten innings
Litton Das is 53 short of becoming the third Bangladesh batter to score 2000 T20I runs
